features: Fabric: Outer shell: 40% Goatskin Leather, 55% Nylon, 5% Polyester, Insert: 100% Polyurethane, Lining: 100% Polyester
Water resistant soft shell along with goatskin leather provides amazing protection against extreme weather
Removable liner adds to the warmth of the glove
Waterproof and breathable and taped inserts
Extended cuff with single hand adjuster
Leather pull tab on the inside wrist
Canada Goose disc at the wrist
